# associatedBugs

**Instance Property**

The set of bugs associated with this test.

## Declaration

```swift
var associatedBugs: [Bug] { get }
```

## Discussion

For information on how to associate a bug with a test, see the documentation for [doc://org.swift.testing/documentation/Testing/Bug].
title: associatedBugs
